flawed_nl_solution:
Kevin has (16 + 5)/3 = <<(16+5)/3=7>>7 candy bars.
Nicole has 7 + 4 = <<7+4=11>>11 candy bars.
Lena has 16 - 11 = <<16-11=7>>7 more candy bars than Nicole

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
